Author: ughhhh-owo
Text: Thank you really, this is my second relapse it started out as trying to get healthier because I was binging every day but slowly developed into this now here I am on my second relapse. I’m only happy when I’m ‘healthy’ it makes me feel so confident when I see the scale numbers drop. I’m in therapy but my parents don’t know about my eating issues, they only care because my sister pointed out how big my jeans are now they never even noticed the first couple times. It makes me happy when I know what I’m eating and how much healthier I’m being than I was before.

Author: afteralltheseye
Text: they care because they love you - they may not understand your way of thinking but they can clearly see that it's causing you distress. straight up this ED shit ain't worth it man. I have no idea who you are but I love you. You gotta learn to not give a fuck about these numbers, about how you look. So much more to life than calculating calories.
